results.name: Triangle of "canonical" optimal Golomb rulers.
comment: n-th row gives first differences of the (n+1)-th row of A106683. - _Andrey Zabolotskiy_, Aug 22 2017
reference: CRC Handbook of Combinatorial Designs, 1996, p. 315.
A. Kotzig and P. J. Laufer, Sum triangles of natural numbers having minimum top, Ars. Combin. 21 (1986), 5-13.
link: N. J. A. Sloane, First few optimal Golomb rulers
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Golomb Ruler
Index entries for sequences related to Golomb rulers
xref: These all start at 1. For rulers starting at 0, see A079283, A079287, A079423, A079425, A079426, A079430, A079433, A079434, A079435, A079454 and
